document.full_text: the cancellation of a music festival this weekend in suzhou has some musicians and festival organizers fearing they may be swept up in the government crackdown on dissent.
document.title: asia: china: fears of crackdown on music events
lines_and_colors: the cancellation of a music festival this weekend in suzhou has some musicians and festival organizers fearing they may be swept up in the government crackdown on dissent.
